name: MicrosoftToDoShoppingList(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, start To Do shopping list”
”Alexa, ask To Do shopping list to add milk and butter”
”Alexa, ask To Do shopping list to remove butter”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: to do shopping list
des:
Connects to a shopping list you have created within Microsoft To Do. This plugin is not provided by Microsoft, but is a private development. This requires a Microsoft account and a To Do list with the name "Shopping list" or "Shoppinglist". The Microsoft account must be linked to the Alexa skill. This can be done either on the skill's website or in the Alexa app. The skill responds "I have added ITEM to the To Do shopping list." If the entry is different, the entry has been written to your Alexa list. This should not happen if the commands below are used correctly. Please contact me at falk@surrounded.de if you have a problem. Thank you very much!

The possible commands are:
- Alexa, ask To Do Shopping list (to) add cereals

- Alexa, ask To Do Shopping list (to) remove cereals
- Alexa, ask To Do Shopping list (to) delete cereals

If "and" appears in the item description, several items are created. Example: "Alexa, tell To Do Shopping list add cucumber and milk" creates the items "cucumber" and "milk".
